name: Ultra Breakout
description:
Inspired by the 70+ video playlist by Lazy Devs, I'm happy to share with you the results of my first real game project. 

Ultra Breakout features 10 levels of various difficulty, 3 control options including standard keyboard, mouse, and touch! Try the game from the lexaloffle bbs if playing mobile: https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=38576

There is a slight point advantage to using the standard controls and a slight point disadvantage to using mouse controls.

I hope you enjoy the quick diversion and checkout the original project here. Good luck breaking your personal highscores!
